original_text: ‘Say this to Solomon's son Rehoboam, the king of Judah. Say it to all the Israelite people who belong to the tribes of Judah and Benjamin.
korean_text: 솔로몬의 아들 유다 왕 르호보암과 유다와 베냐민에 속한 모든 이스라엘 무리에게 말하여 이르기를

sentences.original_text: Say this to Solomon's son Rehoboam
Say it to all the Israelite people
who belong to the tribes of Judah and Benjamin
